E-commerce Platform Redesign

For Luxe Lifestyle

Year 2025
Duration 6 months
Services UI/UX Design, E-commerce Development, Paid Media, Conversion Optimization

Overview

Luxe Lifestyle, a premium home goods retailer, was struggling to translate their in-store luxury experience to digital. We redesigned their e-commerce platform from the ground up, creating an immersive shopping experience that drove record-breaking conversion rates and average order values.

+62% Conversion Rate
+34% Average Order Value
-45% Cart Abandonment
01

The Challenge

Despite strong brand recognition and loyal customers in their physical stores, Luxe Lifestyle's online presence was underperforming. Their website felt dated, the mobile experience was frustrating, and checkout abandonment rates were nearly 80%. They needed a digital experience that matched the premium quality of their products and the personalized service of their stores.

02

Our Solution

Our approach started with extensive user research—shadowing in-store customers and conducting usability testing on the existing site. We identified key friction points and opportunities to create emotional connections through design. The new platform features immersive product photography, a curated discovery experience, and a streamlined checkout process. We also implemented personalization algorithms and integrated their loyalty program. Post-launch, we ran aggressive paid media campaigns with retargeting strategies to maximize the platform's potential.

03

The Results

Measurable outcomes that exceeded expectations.

+62% Conversion Rate

Increase in website conversion rate

+34% Average Order Value

Growth in average transaction value

-45% Cart Abandonment

Reduction in checkout abandonment

+128% Mobile Revenue

Increase in mobile commerce sales

They understood that we weren't just selling products—we're selling a lifestyle. The new platform captures the essence of our brand and has transformed our digital business.

Michael Torres CMO, Luxe Lifestyle
